模块 com.example.BubbleBobble
程序包 com.example.BubbleBobble.Model.Character

类 GameCharacter

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
com.example.BubbleBobble.GameObject
com.example.BubbleBobble.Model.Character.GameCharacter
所有已实现的接口:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
直接已知子类:
Boss, Enemy, Hero
public abstract class GameCharacter extends GameObject
Abstract class for game character The game character contains three concrete class:
  1. hero
  2. enemy
  3. boss
game character class specifies the generic methods of game character class.
